page.title: 16W.CHILTINGTON FARMING
page.content: On July 4th W.Chiltington School 5 yr.olds went for a walk with Mrs.Lyne. "We went past a{lamb,}some{geese}and a{goat.}We saw a{horse}in a field.We went through 2 fields, one with{wheat, the other with{barley}and{potatoes.}On the path we saw some{Rabbit}droppings and then we had a rest. We got up and carried on until we came to a puddle with lots of flies around. In the puddle was a red thing, a sort of ant and I guess the flies were attracted by it.Then we went on to see some{cows {calves}and a{bull.}The cow shed was mucky,it was good in there! After that we went into the Milking Shed to see how it works. When we were looking at the machine we heard a milk lorry pull up outside so we all went out to see it.Then we saw 2{donkeys.}Our mummies brought their cars and took us back to school."
